actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that agricultural workers exempt from the Fair Labor Standards Act are exempt from certain employment and withholding tax requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to provide that agricultural workers exempt from the Fair Labor Standards Act are exempt from certain employment tax requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that agricultural workers exempt from the Fair Labor Standards Act are exempt from certain employment and withholding tax requirements.
